event_text: m_c was grabbed and dropped by an eagle, but they somehow survived.
history_text: m_c was scarred after being grabbed by an eagle.
m_c died from their wounds after being grabbed by an eagle.
grabbed and dropped by an eagle

event_text: m_c thought they were walking on a snowdrift till it gave way and they fell down the mountain, breaking their leg.
history_text: m_c was scarred after falling from a cliff.
m_c died after they fell from a cliff.
fell from a cliff

event_text: m_c fell from a cliff and somehow survived, though not without breaking their leg.
history_text: m_c was scarred after falling from a cliff.
m_c died after they fell from a cliff.
fell from a cliff

event_text: m_c was climbing a tree when they fell, luckily they were only bruised by the incident.
m_c was pushing through some dense shrubs and felt the branches tear painfully at their pelt.
m_c survived a vicious eagle attack - with the claw marks to prove it!
history_text: m_c was scarred by an eagle.
m_c died after an attack by an eagle.
attacked by an eagle

event_text: m_c was climbing a tree and got a splinter from one of the branches.
m_c was moving some branches out of the way when they got a splinter.
m_c was out wandering the territory for a bit too long and came back with frostbite.
history_text: m_c was permanently scarred by frostbite.
m_c was killed by frostbite.
caught frostbite

event_text: m_c fell into a river and inhaled a lot of water before managing to get out, they've been hacking ever since.
history_text: m_c died after they fell in the river and inhaled too much water.
fell into the river.

event_text: m_c's tail was badly injured by falling rocks.
history_text: m_c was scarred by falling rocks.
m_c died after their tail was crushed by falling rocks.
their tail was crushed by falling rocks
